name: CocoZombie
description:
Controls:
[A] and [D] to move your flock Left and Right.
[Space] to Jump/Fly up!
[S] to fast fall.
[Mouse Click] and [Drag] to cut your chickens loose. Be sure to separate any infected chicken!
You get more points based on how many chickens you have.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is the first game that my girlfriend and I ever made.

It's about a chicken who's trying to protect its flock from clouds of zombie chickens.

Sadly, some of your chicks can become infected and you'll need to cut them loose from the flock in order to keep surviving.

All assets (Art, music and scripts) were made during Curdle Jam #26 by us.

I hope you guys can have some fun with it.

Known problems that we're not fixing for lack of time:

  1. Cutting doesn't work as good as it could.
  2. The random spawn, sometimes, can really screw you up. That's life.
  3. Sometimes the Chicks colors get messed up. That's life²
  4. The music is horrible. We're proud of it.
